channel.title: fundamentals on HoneyTrap
channel.description: Recent content in fundamentals on HoneyTrap

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: In this quick start, we’ll start a HoneyTrap with the help of Docker. We will start a Docker container with an image of Honeytrap, automatically downloaded from the docker hub. The configuration file we’ll use for this quick start is described in the Basic config section. We’ll concentrate on implementing only one service, a ssh-simulator with only one channel, the console. This tutorial is created and tested for Linux (Debian/Ubuntu) and MacOSX.

item.title: HoneyTrap Manuals
item.description: In the following sections, you can find manuals available for HoneyTrap.
